home.title: Hi, I'm
home.name: Abdellah Ait Bachikh
home.text: I'm a Full Stack Developer — welcome to my portfolio. Let's build something amazing together!

about.title: About
about.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer from Morocco with 2 years of professional experience in web development. In 2024, I proudly earned my diploma in Full Stack Development with a strong score of 17.74/20. Since then, I’ve been working as a freelancer, collaborating on various professional projects with clients and teams. This journey has allowed me to sharpen my skills, tackle real-world challenges, and deliver high-quality, efficient, and user-friendly applications. I’m always eager to learn, grow, and build innovative solutions that make a difference.
